EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Confi
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey on Thursday, November 5, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, November 5, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1075068/D88F8497AEA20D14DFC56CC260A9CFE4> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date - GF Journey:default=edit me}}
While you wait, check out our replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar> of The Cloud Native Journey with Matt Stine, Senior Product Manager, Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry. He reviewed how companies embracing the cloud native patterns of software delivery will survive and companies that don’t - will not. Watch it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar>!
Don't forget to register for part 2 & 3 of this installment with Michael Coté - Sign up here <http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-journey-webinar-series?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar>.
We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
